*{  
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Roboto:wght@100&display=swap');
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:wght@300&display=swap');

body{
    background-color: rgb(247, 247, 247);
}
a{
    text-decoration: none;
    color: black;
}
.header{
    position: sticky;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px 0px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: row-reverse;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
    background: white;
}
.x{
    display: none;
}
.navigation > a{
    padding: 0 5px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid black;
    background: #ffffff;
    transition: background-color 500ms ease-out, padding 500ms, font-size 800ms;
}
.navigation > a:hover{
    border-radius: 25px;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    padding: 10px;
    padding-left: 10px;
}
#lista{
    display:none;
}
.conteudo{
    /* width: 98.7vw; */
    height: 135vh;
    /* background-color: rebeccapurple; */
}
.apresentacaoBasica{
    position: relative;
    top: 250px;
    margin-left: 19%;
    margin-right: 19%;
    /* background-color: rgb(0, 255, 255); */
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: flex-start;
    width: 30%;
}
.bemVindo{
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    font-size: 1.2em;
    font-weight: bold;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    padding: 10px;
    border-top-left-radius: 20px;
    border-top-right-radius: 20px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 20px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 0px;
    /* position: absolute; */
    /* top:250px;
    left: 100px; */
    color: #ffffff;
    background: #000000;
}
.nome{
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    font-size: 2.6em;
    padding: 27px 0px 0px 0px;
    /* position: absolute; */
    /* top:315px;
    left:100px ; */
}
.dev{
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    font-size: 1.5em;
    /* position: absolute;
    top:318px;
    left:100px; */
    margin-bottom: 15px;
}
.iconesPequenos{
    display:flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}
.iconesPequenos > a{
    font-family:'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
    margin: 2px 10px 5px 0px;
    padding: 10px 0px 0px 0px;
}
.bi{
    vertical-align:middle;
}
.bi:hover{
    color: #13e7e7;
}
.iconesPequenos2{
    display: inline-block;
    /* flex-direction: row-reverse;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-items: center; */
    padding: 30px 40px 0px 0px;
}
.icn{
    vertical-align:text-bottom;
}
.iconesPequenos2 > a{
    padding: 0px 15px;
    margin: 0px 2px;
}
.iconesPequenos2 > a:hover{
    transition: background-color 500ms ease-out, color 300ms;
    color: #ffffff;
    background-color:#13e7e7;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 20%;
}
.divImagem{
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    top: 31%;
    left: 59%;
    border: 20px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    border-radius: 50%;
}
.img{
    border: 20px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.17);
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 360px;
    height: 360px;
}
.sobreMim{
    height: 90vh;
    padding: 33px;
    /* position: relative; */
    top: 600px;
    /* left: 1100px; */
    width: 100%;
    /* height: 600px; */
    font-size: 1.2em;
    display: flex;
    /* background-color: rgb(39, 102, 173); */
    background-color: #f9fbfc;
    justify-content: space-around;
    flex-direction: row;
    align-items: flex-start;
    transition: 1s;
}
.sobreMim:hover{
    box-shadow: 10px 10px 25px 5px #C0C5CE;
}
.divImgSobreMim{
    width: 500px;
    height: 400px;
    background: #f9fbfc;
    display: flex;
}
.imgSobreMim{
    width: 500px;
    height: 400px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-start;
}
.secaoSobreMim{
    border: 1px solid #c0c5cec4;
    border-radius: 10px;
    padding: 10px;
    width: 450px;
    transition: 0.8s;
    /* background-color: rgba(112, 79, 233, 0.39); */
}
.secaoSobreMim:hover{
    border: 1px solid #c0c5ce00;
    box-shadow: 10px 10px 25px 1px #C0C5CE;
}
.h1SobreMim, p{
    padding: 10px;
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
    font-size:medium;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    display: flex;
    /* justify-content: space-around; */
}
.h1SobreMim{
    font-size: 25px;
    line-height: 15px;
}
.secaoSobreMim > p{
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 24px;
}
.secaoSobreMim > ul{
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}
.secaoSobreMim > ul > li{
    cursor: default;
    display: inline-block;
    background-color: #ff040400;
    padding: 4px;
    margin: 2px;
    border: #2696ff solid 1px;
    border-radius: 5px;
}
.secaoSobreMim > ul > li:hover{
    transition: 0.2s;
    background: linear-gradient(29.83deg,#1F95FD 0%,#4FE8E4 100%);
    box-shadow:  inset 0 0 2px #faf8f8;
}
.classeLinkDoDownload{
    width: 200px;
    height: 42px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    border-radius: 20px;
}
.download{
    border: 1px solid #1F95FD;
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    font-weight: bold;
    padding: 10px;
    width: 200px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    text-align: center;
    /* background-color: #13e7e7; */
    background: linear-gradient(29.83deg,#1F95FD 0%,#4FE8E4 100%);;
}
.iconeDownload{
    vertical-align:text-top;
}
.download:hover{
    transition: 0.4s;
    box-shadow:  inset 0 0 10px #faf8f8;
}
.conteudoMeuServico{
    width: 100%;
    background: #fff;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}
.geralGrid{
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 1160px;
    padding: 60px 0px;
}
.tituloMeuServico{
    font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif;;
    max-width: auto;
    margin-left: 60px;
    font-size: 55px;
    line-height: 60px;
    font-weight: 800;
    color: #0e1c34;
    text-align: center;
    margin: 0px 0px 60px 0px;
}
.meuServicoGridGeral{
    display: grid;
    grid-template-rows: auto;
    grid-template-columns: auto auto auto;
    gap: 50px 40px;
    justify-items: center;
    background: #f9fbfc;
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    vertical-align: middle;
    padding: 60px 0px;
}
.meuServicoGridGeral > .grid > img{
    width: 70px;
    padding: 10px;
}
/* .meuServicoGridGeral > .grid:hover{
    transition: 0.5s;
    padding: 10px;
} */
.meuServicoGridGeral > .grid > img:hover{
    padding: 5px;
    transition: 0.4s;
}
.meuServicoGridGeral > .grid{
    padding: 0px 60px;
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 34px;
    color: #535353;
}
.g2{
    border-left: 1px dashed rgb(182, 190, 194);
    border-right: 1px dashed rgb(182, 190, 194);
}
/* .ProjetoEmDestaque{
    width: 100%;
    height: 30%;
    background-color: rebeccapurple;
}
.containerProjetoEmDestaque{
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
.tituloProjetoEmDestaque{
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    color: #0e1c34;
    font-size: 20px;
}
.tela{
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background-color: rebeccapurple;

.mySkills{
    padding: 10px;
    display: flex;
    width: auto;
    height: 90vh;
    /* background-color: rebeccapurple; */
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    align-content: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.geral{
    display: flex;
    height: 60vh;
    padding: 0px 80px;
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 800px;
    /* background-color: red; */
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    justify-content: space-around;
}
.tituloHT{
    display: flex;
    font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
    color: #0e1c34;
    font-size: 20px;
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
}
.texto > p{
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    font-size: 20px;
    font-weight: 800;
}
.barra{
    border-radius: 15px;
}
.barra-vazia{
    height: 10px;
    background-color: #353b48;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #2187e7;
}
.barra-cheia{
    /* position: absolute; */
    height: 10px;
    background-color: #2187e7;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px #2187e7;
}
.um{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 80%;
    animation: um 4s;
}
.dois{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 75%;
    animation: dois 4.5s;
}
.tres{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 63%;
    animation: tres 4.5s;
}
.quatro{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 50%;
    animation: quatro 4.5s;
}
.cinco{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 60%;
    animation: cinco 4.5s;
}
.seis{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 75%;
    animation: seis 4.5s;
}
.sete{
    max-width: 640px;
    width: 62%;
    animation: sete 4.5s;
}


@media screen and (max-width: 1021px){
    .img{
        width: 300px;
        height: 300px;
    }
    .bemVindo{
        font-size: 1.1em;
    }
    .nome{
        font-size: 2.3em;
    }
    .dev{
        font-size: 1.2em;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 414px){
    .header{
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }
    #lista{
        display: flex;
    }
    #windows{
        display: none;
    }
    .navigation{
        display: none;
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    .navigation > a{
        padding: 5px;
        border: none;
    }
    .apresentacaoBasica{
        margin: 0;
        width: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: absolute;
        top: 250px;
        background-color: aqua;
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .bemVindo{
        font-size: 1em;
    }
    .nome{
        font-size: 2em;
    }
    .dev{
        font-size: 1em;
    }
    .iconesPequenos {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: space-evenly;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .divImagem{
        position: relative;
        margin: auto;
        top: 20px;
        left: 0px;
        width: 140px;
        height: 140px;
    }
    .img{
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }
    .teste{
        position: relative;
        top: -150px;
        display: flex;
        background-color: red;
        width: 35%;
        padding: 50px;
        padding-left: 5px;
        transition: padding 0.5s, opacity 0.5s;
        flex-direction: column;
        box-shadow: -1px 4px 8px grey;
        left: 265px;
        /* opacity: 0; */
    }
    .teste > a:active{
        color: blue;
        padding: 10px;
    }
    .teste > a{
        padding: 16px 20px;
    }
    .x{
        position:absolute;
    }
}


@keyframes um {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 95%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 65%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 80%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes dois {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 85%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 65%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 75%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes tres {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 85%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 68%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 63%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes quatro {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 70%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 45%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 50%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes cinco {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 75%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 50%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 60%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes seis {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 93%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 65%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 75%;
    }
    
}
@keyframes sete {
    0%{
        width: 0%;
    }
    40%{
        width: 95%;
    }
    70%{
        width: 65%;
    }
    100%{
        width: 62%;
    }
    
}

/*ANIMAÇÕES*/
[data-anima]{
    opacity: 0;
    transition: 0.7s;
}
[data-anima = "esquerda"]{
    transform: translate3d(-50px, 0, 0);
}
[data-anima = "direita"]{
    transform: translate3d(50px, 0, 0);
}
[data-anima = "centro"]{
    transform: translate3d(0, 40px, 0);
}
[data-anima].animacao{
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translate3d(0,0,0);
}

const elementos = document.querySelectorAll('[data-anima]');
const animacaoClasse = 'animacao';

function animaScroll(){
    const topoPaginaNaJanela = window.pageYOffset+((window.innerHeight*3)/4);
    elementos.forEach(function(elemento){
        if(topoPaginaNaJanela > elemento.offsetTop){
            elemento.classList.add(animacaoClasse);
        }

    });
}

if(elementos.length){
    window.addEventListener("scroll",function(){
        animaScroll();
    })
}
